sys_data_source.name: Fortify - Suppresed Issues
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
/* ** Get a list of Issues from previous day whose SUPPRESSED value has changed ** ** The "Suppressed" GUID is 22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222 ** (SELECT TOP 1000 * FROM attr) ** ** The "OWASP Top 10 2013" GUID is 1A2B4C7E-93B0-4502-878A-9BE40D2A25C4 ** (SELECT TOP 1000 * FROM catpackexternallist) ** ** Do NOT include these Project IDs: ** 15 = test ** 41 = Open Source ** 46 = 3rd Party */
-- FIRST, create a temporary table of issues and OWASP Top 10 2013 value that were SUPPRESSED over the last 30 days SELECT DISTINCT [i].[id] AS [issue_id] ,[ssc].[dbo].[getExternalCategories]([i].[mappedCategory], '1A2B4C7E-93B0-4502-878A-9BE40D2A25C4') AS [owasp2013] INTO [#owasp] FROM [ssc].[dbo].[issue] AS [i] INNER JOIN [ssc].[dbo].[projectversion] AS [pv] ON [i].[projectVersion_id] = [pv].[id] INNER JOIN [ssc].[dbo].[project] AS [p] ON [pv].[project_id] = [p].[id] LEFT JOIN [ssc].[dbo].[audithistoryview] AS [ahv] ON [i].[id] = [ahv].[issue_id] WHERE [i].[engineType] = 'SCA' AND [p].[id] NOT IN (15, 41, 46) AND [pv].[active] = 'Y' AND [i].[scanStatus] <> 'REMOVED' AND (DATEADD(SECOND, [ahv].[auditTime] / 1000, '1970-01-01') >= DATEADD(DAY, DATEDIFF(DAY, 0, GETDATE() - 29), 0) AND DATEADD(SECOND, [ahv].[auditTime] / 1000, '1970-01-01') < DATEADD(DAY, DATEDIFF(DAY, 0, GETDATE() + 1), 0)) ORDER BY [i].[id]
-- SECOND, create a temporary table of the last suppression change on an issue over the last 30 days SELECT [issue_id] AS [issue_id] ,MAX([seqNumber]) AS [seqNumber] INTO [#lastAudits] FROM [ssc].[dbo].[audithistoryview] WHERE [attrGuid] = '22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222' AND (DATEADD(SECOND, [auditTime] / 1000, '1970-01-01') >= DATEADD(DAY, DATEDIFF(DAY, 0, GETDATE() - 29), 0) AND DATEADD(SECOND, [auditTime] / 1000, '1970-01-01') < DATEADD(DAY, DATEDIFF(DAY, 0, GETDATE() + 1), 0)) GROUP BY [issue_id] ORDER BY [issue_id]
-- THIRD, create a temporary table of the suppression information for the last suppression change on an issue over the last 30 days SELECT [ahv].[issue_id] AS [issue_id] ,ISNULL([ahv].[newValue], 'Not Set') AS [newValue] ,[ahv].[auditTime] AS [auditTime] INTO [#historicalAudits] FROM [ssc].[dbo].[audithistoryview] AS [ahv] INNER JOIN [#lastAudits] AS [la] ON [ahv].[issue_id] = [la].[issue_id] AND [ahv].[seqNumber] = [la].[seqNumber] ORDER BY [ahv].[issue_id]
-- FOURTH, retrieve the issues that are OWASP Top 10 2013 related SELECT [i].[id] as [ID] ,DATEADD(SECOND, [ha].[auditTime] / 1000, '1970-01-01') AS [auditTime] ,[i].[suppressed] AS [Suppressed] ,[i].[scanStatus] AS [Status] FROM [ssc].[dbo].[issue] AS [i] INNER JOIN [#historicalAudits] AS [ha] ON [i].[id] = [ha].[issue_id] INNER JOIN [#owasp] AS [o] ON [i].[id] = [o].[issue_id] WHERE [o].[owasp2013] IS NOT NULL ORDER BY [i].[id]
-- FIFTH, clean up temporary tables DROP TABLE [#owasp] DROP TABLE [#lastAudits] DROP TABLE [#historicalAudits]
